Class FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptParseException 

FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptException
   |
   +----FESI.Exceptions.EcmaScriptParseException
public class EcmaScriptParseException
extends EcmaScriptException
implements EcmaScriptConstants
Exception used to signal parsing errors

EcmaScriptParseException(ParseException, EvaluationSource)
Create a new parsing exception

getLineNumber()
Get the line number of the error if possible
getMessage()
Display the message, the originating exception and the EmcaScript callback chain.
isIncomplete()
return true if incomplete parse (maybe the user is given a chance to complete it)
setNeverIncomplete()
Indicate that this cannot be a recoverable incomplete error because, for example, the evaluation source is a string passed as a parameter to eval, not a stream read from an user.

EcmaScriptParseException 
 public EcmaScriptParseException(ParseException e,
                                 EvaluationSource s)
Create a new parsing exception

Parameters:
e - The error from the parser
s - The evaluation source location of the error

getLineNumber 
 public int getLineNumber()
Get the line number of the error if possible

isIncomplete 
 public boolean isIncomplete()
return true if incomplete parse (maybe the user is given a chance to complete it)

Overrides:

setNeverIncomplete 
 public void setNeverIncomplete()
Indicate that this cannot be a recoverable incomplete error because, for example, the evaluation source is a string passed as a parameter to eval, not a stream read from an user.

getMessage

Display the message, the originating exception and the EmcaScript callback chain.
